tool_description: Based on portrait segmentation technology, it realizes 2D to 3D conversion of photos to achieve the effect of 3D naked eye slow motion. The selfie image and the background image using Hitchcock technology senseless fusion, open the scene stretching video shooting new way to play, can be used for personal social entertainment, film and television drama effect simulation shooting, etc.
name: Photo to 3d slow-motion
title: Photo to 3d slow-motion

api_list.name: Photo to 3d slow-motion

required_parameters.name: image_target
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPEG` `JPG` `PNG` `BMP`
- **Image size**: No more than 5 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Less than 4096x4096px.

optional_parameters.name: device_type
optional_parameters.description:
Device Type.
- Default: `0`
- `0`: Non-Apple phones.
- `1`: Apple phone.

optional_parameters.name: video_type
optional_parameters.description:
Video playback direction.
- Default: `0`
- `0`: Play forward.
- `1`: Play backward.
- `2`: Play before and after.
